name: dice-journey
description: A dice rolling app for creating and playing interactive journeys
author: Fergus Mullineux

scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run electron:build-main && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && npm run electron:build-main && electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && npm run electron:build-main && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && npm run electron:build-main && electron-builder --linux
